|default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:80:C6 |oui_eth=00:80:C6 }}[http://web.archive.org/web/20060305231700/http://www.sohoware.com/serv/ncp110-man-a2.pdf Manual for the '''Netblaster II''' lineup (via archive.org)] "68-806900-07 REV:X1" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos. [http://www.qsl.net/n9zia/wireless/appendixG.html Listed on ''N9ZIA'''s '''802.11 Wireless LAN Cards''' page] (w/ [http://www.qsl.net/n9zia/wireless/pdf/ap-6.pdf FCC schematics] mirrored) [http://www.practicallynetworked.com/review.asp?pid=376 ''Tim Higgins'' review on '''Practically Networked'''] (dated 03/22/2001)
[http://archive.org/stream/computer_shopper-2001-11/ComputerShopper_2001_November#page/n47/mode/2up/search/wireless In the November 2001 '''Computer Shopper''' - '''archive.org'''] This device does not have a web configuration interface.
